channel.title: CVE Feed for kernel -- heap-based buffer overflow in fs/ext4/xattr.c
channel.description: The latest CVEs for kernel -- heap-based buffer overflow in fs/ext4/xattr.c

item.title: CVE-2018-10840|2024-08-05T07:46:47.078Z -- kernel -- heap-based%20buffer%20overflow%20in%20fs%2Fext4%2Fxattr.c
item.description: Linux kernel is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow in the fs/ext4/xattr.c:ext4_xattr_set_entry() function. An attacker could exploit this by operating on a mounted crafted ext4 image.
